name: time to kill for this exquisite lavender
name_original: time to kill for this exquisite lavender
description:
When IT doesn't have lavender, It's capable to do every thing to get some. Even to kill the well loved behemoth, but it as no time to fully prepare itself. Fortunately there's a carnival to help.   

In this game you must know your priorities in order to defeat the demon, strength, defense, speed, or save your time for the battle (you can't get all).

This is a game made for the epic game jam by Stan, Nico, Jean, Chadi, Simon
